name: The Greatest Ultimate Candy Challenge!
description:
Both: Presenting, The Greatest Ultimate Candy Challenge!!

Kid: Or TGUCC as we say

Spooky: Its a set of challenges where you can set once and for all with your friends who is the best scarier at Trick or Treats! 

Kid: Or Candy Hunt

Spooky: And so much more game modes that you can try! Invented by your 🌟charming host🌟

Kid: Pls no...

Spooky: The game is available for playing online 1v1 or local multiplayer, or even training mode for those sweaties out there *wink wink*

Kid: Or you can definitely make the living hell out of our totally-normal-guests just for fun!

Spooky: Yeah, see you there!

Spooky: Psst, btw, find th3 s3cr3t k3y 👀
